snippet.title: ScourgeBringer - Animated Release Trailer
snippet.description:
ScourgeBringer is out now on PC, Nintendo Switch & Xbox!

ScourgeBringer is a fast-paced free-moving roguelite platformer. Help Kyhra to explore the unknown and slash her way through ancient machines guarding the seal of her past, and maybe the redemption of humanity

Nintendo Switch US: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/scourgebringer-switch/

Nintendo Switch EUR: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/ScourgeBringer-1858310.html

Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/scourgebringer-game-preview/9nxpv1t3ws34?activetab=pivot:overviewtab

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1037020/ScourgeBringer/

Epic: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/product/scourgebringer/home?lang=en-US

GoG: https://www.gog.com/game/scourgebringer

Join Flying Oak Discord to know more about the game’s development:
http://discord.gg/flyingoak

Trailer credits:
Music by Joonas Turner
Choleau Thibault - FX, BG color, charadesign rought
Chapuis Eric - Storyboard, BG line
Colas Martin - Clean animation
Claverie Gabriel - Chara design, Storyboard, Animation, FX, color & compositing - editing
Production - SEEGN
